name: Brandon Norman Troy
description:
Ah, so you think Cinderella is just a fairy tale? Maybe so. But as crazy as it sounds, I want to believe in fairy tales and I want to believe in love. I still hope that chivalry isn’t dead. I want a woman I can relax in, dream with and cheer on. I want a princess charming that I can build with. I still believe there is at least one woman out there who is honest, faithful and true. Surely there is a woman of conviction and integrity that still walks the earth. If you are “her,” then please return with my glass slipper so we can meet the exciting future that awaits us.
Sending BIG hugs and a little “magic” your way,
